sn46.19:4.1: “Mendicants, when these seven awakening factors are developed and cultivated they are noble and emancipating, and bring one who practices them to the complete end of suffering.
sn46.19:4.3: The awakening-factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, samādhi, and equanimity.
sn46.19:4.5: When these seven awakening factors are developed and cultivated they are noble and emancipating, and bring one who practices them to the complete end of suffering.”
